title: Buffalo Plaid Red Waterproof and Odorproof Dog Collar - Small - 16 inch Long x 3/4 Inch Wide -
features: WATERPROOF - We make these collars from start to finish to be waterproof, odorproof, and resistant to dirt and grime. American Owned & Operated!

MADE FOR ACTIVE DOGS - Urethane coated durable polyester, these collars are built for comfort and action. Great for outdoor dogs, water dogs, field dogs, and service dogs. Collar will soften with age.

SIZING - Measure your dogs neck and select a size based on the following. But keep in mind that you can cut and resize these collars yourself as needed - Small 10-13", Medium 13-17", Large 17-20", X-Large 20-24"
AMERICAN OWNED. AMERICAN OPERATED. - Manufactured by Yellow Dog Design Inc. in Greensboro, NC with some global materials. We appreciate your support of US based businesses.

LONG LASTING QUALITY - This collar has been specifically designed to be resistant to odor, dirt, salt water, fresh water, rough outdoor play and work, tearing, chewing, and just about anything else your dog can do to it.
description: This is a Urethane coated waterproof and odorprood dog collar from Yellow Dog Design, made in the US with some global materials. Made specifically for outdoor dogs and dogs who get into messy situations. Or just dogs whose collars tend to smell!

QUALITY - Made with premium all weather nickel plated hardware including a d-ring for attaching to a leash and also to hold an ID Tag. The special urethane coating is resistant to odor, salt water, fresh water, dirt, and grime. Plus it's easy to clean and will soften with wear

SIZING - The sizing for this dog collar is given as a size # and width. Most dogs use a collar that is 2 inches above their neck size. Meaning a dog with a 14 inch neck will use a collar size #16. But these collars are adjustable so a single collar size can be adjusted to fit a wide range of neck sizes. Available Sizes include:

SMALL is 16 inch L x 3/4 inch W with a 10.5-13 inch Wearable LengthMEDIUM is 20 inch L x 3/4 inch W with a 13.5-17 inch Wearable LengthLARGE is 23 inch L x 1 inch W with a 17.5-20 inch Wearable LengthX-LARGE is 27 inch L x 1 inch W with a 20.5-24 inch Wearable Length
